Hamadryads rule over an entire forest, or a portion of an incredibly large forest, leading and protecting all dryads within. Hamadryads often have strange relationships with powerful and deadly fey, working together in a dualistic way despite their differences, with the hamadryad representing nature’s wonders and the other fey representing nature’s wrath. **[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 33 **[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Dryad Queen](/Monsters.aspx?ID=314) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 249 **Perception** +25; low-light vision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +25, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +23, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +30, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +30, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +24, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +24 **Str** +2 **Dex** +6 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +8 **Nature Empathy** The dryad can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on and make very simple Requests of animals and plants.
**Tied to the Land** --- **AC** 35 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +26 **Will** +24 **HP** 220 **Weaknesses** cold iron 10, fire 10 **Nymph’s Beauty** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) DC 30. On a failed save, the target is immobilized in awe for 1 minute. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** branch +27 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d12+8 bludgeoning **Ranged** leaves +27 ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d8+6 slashing **Primal Prepared Spells** DC 35, attack +25 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **1st** [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), [Negate Aroma](/Spells.aspx?ID=206) - **2nd** [Animal Messenger](/Spells.aspx?ID=11), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107), [Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252) - **3rd** [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366) - **4th** [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312) - **5th** [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Death Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) - **6th** [Baleful Polymorph](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331) - **7th** [Regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=325) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 35, attack +25 - **Cantrips (5th)** [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330) - **2nd** [Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=277) (at will), [Tree Shape](/Spells.aspx?ID=342) (at will) - **3rd** [Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103) (at will), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288) (at will) - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (at will), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (at will) - **5th** [Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343) (x3) - **8th** [Impaling Briars](/Spells.aspx?ID=475) - **Constant (4th)** [Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Focus Beauty** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) On a failed save, if the target was already affected by the dryad queen’s beauty, the target suffers the effects of a failed save against _[charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)_. **Inspiration** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Tree Meld** ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The hamadryad touches a tree within her domain of enough volume to contain her and merges into it for as long as she wishes. She can Cast a Spell while inside as long as the spell doesn’t require a line of effect outside the tree. She can hear, but not see, what’s going on outside the tree. She can enter or exit her extradimensional domain from any tree in her domain. She can Dismiss this effect.
Significant physical damage dealt to the tree expels the hamadryad from the tree and deals 3d6 damage to her. _[Passwall](/Spells.aspx?ID=216)_ expels the hamadryad without dealing damage.
If a dryad uses this ability on her bonded tree, she instead enters an extradimensional living space within the tree; Tree Meld gains the [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) trait. A hamadryad can bring up to eight other creatures with her when entering her home within her bonded tree. The hamadryad can still be expelled from this space as above.
